00020 LookupTableBatch::LookupTableBatch(int observations, int outputs) : LookupTable(observations, outputs) {
00021 
00022     grads.resize(outputs, observations); 
00023 }

00025    
00026 void LookupTableBatch::batchStep() {
00027     noalias(params) += stepSize*grads;
00028 }
00029 
00030 void LookupTableBatch::computeDirection(int steps) {
00031     grads/=steps;
00032 }
00033     
00034 void LookupTableBatch::accumulateGrad(double reward, Observation& newObs) {
00035     noalias(grads) += reward*trace;
00036 }

00039 void LookupTableBatch::resetGrad() {
00040     grads.clear();
00041 }

00044 void LookupTableBatch::scatter(Vector& v, Approximator::StatsEnum s) {
00045     
00046     assert(v.size()==(size_t)(params.size1()*params.size2()));
00047         
00048     switch (s) {
00049         case GRADS:
00050             params.clear();
00051             UBlasExtras::addScaledVectorToMatrix(1.0, v, grads, 0);
00052             break;
00053         default:
00054             LookupTableBatch::scatter(v, s);
00055     }
00056 
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void LookupTableBatch::reduce(Vector& v, Approximator::StatsEnum s) {
00061 
00062     assert(v.size() >= (size_t)params.size1()*params.size2());
00063 
00064     switch (s) {
00065         case GRADS:
00066             UBlasExtras::addMatrixToVector(grads, v, 0);
00067             break;
00068         default:
00069             LookupTable::reduce(v, s);
00070     }
00071 
00072 }
